result.eng: I go swimming in the pool in Salthill.
result.ga: Téim ag snámh sa linn snámha i mBóthar na Trá

result.ponchtml: Téim ag snáṁ sa linn snáṁa i mBóṫar na TráI go swimming in the pool in Salthill.

result.eng: Are you working in Salthill still?
